      • onlineClassification

        protected double[] onlineClassification(weka.core.Instances ins,
                                        double[] weight)
        Classifies the Instances by generating a new weight using the Online Update method. The Online Update method updates the weight every time an instance is incorrectly classified. The loop will not stop altering the weight until a full loop has passed with correct classifications, or until the maximum number of loops have passed defined by the depth attribute.
        Parameters:
        ins - The Instances object that will used for training.
        weight - The weight that will be updated
        Returns:
        double[] The new weight
